price: 6 Ô homme ! Qu’est-ce qui a bien pu t’abuser au sujet de ton noble Seigneur[1562]
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ ٱلۡكَرِيمِ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-insānu mā gharraka birabbika al-karīmi
